sentences.english: He restored the traditional chanting and created more opportunities for monastics to propagate the Dharma by means of chanting.
sentences.chinese: 不但恢复传统梵呗也同时培养了更多梵呗高僧来传播。

sentences.english: LOS ANGELES — Two mullahs gaze out on a crowd of protesters in Tehran.
sentences.chinese: 在德黑兰，两位高僧向外注视着一群示威者。

sentences.english: Virtuoso Chai Bo was one of the four famous hierarches of Buddhism in late Ming Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 紫柏大师是佛教界著名的四大高僧之一。

sentences.english: Empress see the zhen son and let her mother and son meet, and monks to leave.
sentences.chinese: 皇后见贞儿前来便让她母子相见，与高僧离去。

sentences.english: Before 1956, the temple had a repository for a relic of Monk Xuan Zhuang of Tang.
sentences.chinese: 年前，寺院内还供奉唐代高僧玄奘法师的舍利。

sentences.english: Venerable Wuda was a highly respected monk in the imperial court of the Tang dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 这本忏文是中国唐朝高僧悟达国师编写的。
其中一个高僧说，“把记者抓起来。”

sentences.english: Insiders said 3 monks arrived in Shenzhen, where Foxconn is based, Monday night.
sentences.chinese: 据知情人士透露，3位高僧已于10日晚抵达深圳。

sentences.english: Moved by his action, the tiger became his disciple, practicing Buddhism and protecting him at the Cave.
sentences.chinese: 后来老虎主动来到观音洞听法修行，并保护高僧。

sentences.english: The eminent Chinese monk Fahien visited Indonesia in the 4th century AD.
sentences.chinese: 公元8世纪，中国高僧义净到过印尼。

sentences.english: She went to see a well respected Buddhist monk to ask for advice.
sentences.chinese: 于是，她去向一个德高望重的高僧寻求建议。

definition: Dharma (the teachings of the Buddha)/Buddhist doctrine
death/to pass away (of Buddhist monks, nuns etc)
one of three fabled islands in Eastern sea, abode of immortals
square zhang (i.e. unit of area 10 feet square)/monastic room 10 feet square/Buddhist or Daoist abbot/abbot's chamber
Living Buddha/title of Mongolian Lamas from 17th century
to pass on doctrines from master to disciple (Buddhism)
